sentences.sContent: Mike rubbed the back of his neck.
You have a lot of tension in your neck muscles.
She had a mass of golden hair, which she wore in a coil at the nape  of her neck.
sentences.sCn: 她有一头金发，盘在脖子后面。

sentences.sContent: The dog picked up the puppy and carried it by the scruff of the neck into the house.
sentences.sCn: 那条狗叼住小狗的后颈，把它叼进了屋子。

phrases.pCn: 脖子发僵，斜颈；顽固之人
附近一带（一般指乡村地区）
手边的事情太多；忙的不可开交
◎【赛马】以一颈之差(获胜或失败)

words.tran: 变细；使变窄（neck的现在分词）
变细；与…亲嘴；宰杀（neck的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: the part of your body that joins your head to your shoulders, or the same part of an animal or bird
if two people are necking, they kiss for a long time in a sexual way
